name: Rodger Brown
bio: Rodger Brown is a career educator dedicated to preparing students for success in technology and computer science. With over a decade of teaching experience, he integrates real-world workflows, industry tools, and emerging technologies into his curriculum to ensure students gain practical, job-ready skills. Rodger is passionate about fostering innovation and critical thinking in the classroom, helping students stay ahead in an ever-evolving digital landscape. He is married with three kids. When not teaching, he enjoys film, games, camping, and off-roading.
